prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
Police have deployed an armoured vehicle to pry open the cabin of a lorry on a motorway in Texas.

The driver refused to stop, or get out of the cab when officers used spike strips to stop the vehicle, police said.

After the armoured vehicle tore open a window, police threw in a gas canister, before going inside and pulling the driver out.

It is unclear what started the chase, but police said the driver used "evasive manoeuvres", changing lanes multiple times and swerving.

“We still don’t know why he was acting in the erratic manner that he was,” Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez told journalists, adding that he appeared to have "some heavy impairment".
stories: Authorities have deployed an armoured vehicle to break into a truck on a Texas highway after its driver resisted a traffic stop. When officers employed spikes to halt the vehicle, the driver refused to comply, continuing to drive while the officers used evasive tactics, such as rapid lane changes and swerving. In response, the armoured vehicle forcibly opened a window, and police threw in a tear gas canister before entering the cabin and removing the driver.

Law enforcement officers responded to a high-risk traffic stop on a Texas highway, deploying an armoured vehicle to gain access to a truck whose driver was resisting arrest. After attempting to immobilize the vehicle with tire spikes, the driver persisted in driving, leading officers to employ defensive maneuvers such as sudden lane changes and swerving. As a last resort, the armoured vehicle breached a window, and officers deployed tear gas and entered the cab, subsequently removing the defiant driver.

Police officers were called to a potentially hazardous traffic stop on a Texas highway, where they needed an armored vehicle to reach a truck whose driver was refusing to cooperate. After trying to stop the vehicle by deploying tire spikes, the driver continued to drive despite this, prompting the officers to employ evasive maneuvers such as rapid lane changes and swerving. In a final desperate attempt, the armored vehicle broke a window, and officers released tear gas and entered the truck's cab, ultimately removing the recalcitrant driver.
